languages.text: "Тревожная. Рейды {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} участились, торговля страдает, а окраинные миры разоряются. Слухи о зверствах, которые творят враги Человечества, вызывают излишнюю панику в силу своей... экзотичности".

traits.locale_text: "Тревожная. Рейды ксеносов участились, торговля страдает, а окраинные миры разоряются. Слухи о зверствах, которые творят враги человечества, вызывают излишнюю панику в силу своей... экзотичности".
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."
languages.original_text: "Тревожная. Рейды {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g} участились, торговля страдает, а окраинные миры разоряются. Слухи о зверствах, которые творят враги Человечества, вызывают излишнюю панику в силу своей... экзотичности".

traits.locale_text: "Troubling. Xenos raids are growing more frequent, the trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumors of atrocities being committed by enemies of humanity cause excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.locale_text: "Troubling. Xenos raids are growing more frequent, the trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumors of atrocities being committed by enemies of humanity cause excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.locale_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

traits.locale_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: 「面倒なことだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の襲撃はますます増えて、交易は困難を極め、辺境の惑星は崩壊しつつある。人類の敵が残虐行為を行っているという噂が、彼らの…エキゾチックな性質のせいで過度なパニックを招いている」
languages.original_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."

traits.locale_text: 「面倒なことだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の襲撃はますます増えて、交易は困難を極め、辺境の惑星は崩壊しつつある。人類の敵が残虐行為を行っているという噂が、彼らの…エキゾチックな性質のせいで過度なパニックを招いている」
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: “令人不安。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}的袭击越来越频繁，贸易受到影响，边缘世界正在崩溃。关于人类之敌的暴行的谣言，已经引发了大规模恐慌，因为这些暴行充满了……非人的本质。”
languages.original_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."

traits.locale_text: “令人不安。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}的袭击越来越频繁，贸易受到影响，边缘世界正在崩溃。关于人类之敌的暴行的谣言，已经引发了大规模恐慌，因为这些暴行充满了……非人的本质。”
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: «Preocupante, cuando menos. Se producen asaltos a manos de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} con cada vez más frecuencia, el comercio se resiente y los mundos aledaños sufren las consecuencias. Los rumores sobre las atrocidades que comenten los enemigos de la Humanidad están sembrando el pánico debido a su... naturaleza exótica».
languages.original_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."

traits.locale_text: «Preocupante, cuando menos. Se producen asaltos a manos de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} con cada vez más frecuencia, el comercio se resiente y los mundos aledaños sufren las consecuencias. Los rumores sobre las atrocidades que comenten los enemigos de la Humanidad están sembrando el pánico debido a su... naturaleza exótica».
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: « La situation est inquiétante. Les attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} sont de plus en plus fréquentes, le commerce va mal et les mondes des confins tombent les uns après les autres. On raconte que les ennemis de l'humanité commettent les pires horreurs, et ces rumeurs sèment la panique de par leur nature... exotique. »
languages.original_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."

traits.locale_text: « La situation est inquiétante. Les attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} sont de plus en plus fréquentes, le commerce va mal et les mondes des confins tombent les uns après les autres. On raconte que les ennemis de l'humanité commettent les pires horreurs, et ces rumeurs sèment la panique de par leur nature... exotique. »
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: "Beunruhigend. Wir haben immer häufiger {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Überfälle, der Handel leidet, und Randwelten gehen unter. Gerüchte über Gräueltaten durch Feinde der Menschheit lösen Panik aus, weil sie recht ... exotisch anmuten."
languages.original_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."

traits.locale_text: "Beunruhigend. Wir haben immer häufiger {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Überfälle, der Handel leidet, und Randwelten gehen unter. Gerüchte über Gräueltaten durch Feinde der Menschheit lösen Panik aus, weil sie recht ... exotisch anmuten."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege

languages.text: "Sıkıntılı. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} baskınları giderek sıklaşıyor, ticaret içler acısı, uç dünyalar ise batmanın eşiğinde. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının vahşetlerine dair söylentiler... Egzotik doğaları sebebiyle ziyadesiyle paniğe neden oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Troubling. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} raids are growing more frequent, trade is suffering, and fringe worlds are going under. Rumours of atrocities being committed by enemies of Humanity are causing excessive panic due to their... exotic nature."

traits.locale_text: "Sıkıntılı. {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} baskınları giderek sıklaşıyor, ticaret içler acısı, uç dünyalar ise batmanın eşiğinde. İnsanlığın düşmanlarının işlediği söylenen vahşetler... Egzotik doğaları sebebiyle ziyadesiyle paniğe neden oluyor."
traits.speaker: FootfallLiege
